content.description:
Start on the right bomber undercling that you can meathook. Make your way to the jug under the lip, then get up around and mantle over, right of the large crack. Similar ending to Right Side Left next to it.

Couple different intermediate options when making your way to the lip or just reach big and keep good tension. Then find the toe hooks and stay strong!
content.location: Right side of the cave on the right undercling that you can meathook. Get those feet on the wall and keep the tension

content.description:
On the right side of the cave, there are two underclings tucked back in it. Start matched on the left undercling and make your way to the jugs under the lip. Reach up around, heel hook, and bump for the better crimp. Finish the mantle and you're done! Avoid using the left of the crack when mantling for extra challenge.

Careful not to dab if you cut feet since it's kind of low to the ground

Possible start one move further back but there were birds nests in it at the time

Not sure what the grading is like in Moe's but felt V4ish to me. Harder if you're short probably

Lots of broken glass nearby at the time 05/2021, so careful if barefoot between climbs
content.location: Right Side of the cave. Two big underclings, a left and right one. Start macthed on the left mondo jug undercling and your feet pressed into the wall
